snippet.title: Backbone Launches on June 8 | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Backbone on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/865610/Backbone/

Pull on your trenchcoat and step into the shoes of raccoon private investigator, Howard Lotor, and explore dystopian Vancouver, BC, beautifully rendered in high resolution pixel art. Post-noir detective adventure Backbone will release on PC June 8, 2021. 

Play Act One in Backbone: Prologue for free: https://store.steampowered.com/app/992310/Backbone_Prologue/

Learn More: https://eggnut.net/
